*.description: May see CI status results for all repositories
May modify and set CI status results for all repositories

readCIStatus.description: May read status tags from CI servers

writeCIStatus.description: May set status tags for CI servers

CIStatusAllSuccessRule.name: All CI status successful
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.description: Check if all retrieved CI status messages are successful.
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.success: A sufficient number of CI status messages are successful.
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.failed: At least one CI status is not successful.
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.obstacle: At least one CI status is not successful.

CIStatusXSuccessRule.name: X CI-Status messages
CIStatusXSuccessRule.description: Verify that at least {{ numberOfSuccessful }} CI-Status messages are successful.
CIStatusXSuccessRule.success: A sufficient number of CI-Status messages are successful.
CIStatusXSuccessRule.failed: Only {{ current }} of {{ expected }} required successful CI-Status messages present.
CIStatusXSuccessRule.obstacle: Not enough successful CI-Status messages available.

numberOfSuccessful.label: Quantity
numberOfSuccessful.helpText: Minimum number of successful CI-Status messages.
numberOfSuccessful.errorMessage: The value must be bigger than 0.
